thread.section_title: Vodafone Ireland Reviews | Customer Service Reviews of Vodafone Ireland | www.vodafone.ie
thread.title: MaiTreYaBuddha

author: MaiTreYaBuddha
title: MaiTreYaBuddha
text:
This review is for my Vodafone Mobile Broadband, which is a 3G connection , but thru my 4G dongle.
I've been using Vodafone's Mobile Broadband in Co. Cavan and now, here in Glenties, Donegal, in the rural mountains, for 4 years now.
I work as a semi-retired software engineer, so consume heavy bandwith, working remotely and having to download large (very large) software tools and so on.
Now, to be fair others , I live within Line-of-sight of our local Radio Base Station's Antennae/Mast, so that explains the super fast speeds I get, most of the time.
Nevertheless, I have been very happy with Vodafone's Mobile Broadband service- even if a tad expensive- for 4 years now.
They've really helped my family connect to the rest of the world, and earn a living , thru remote working.
I'm even able to conduct Teamviewer(remote desktop) sessions, and have hit up to (wait for this, drum roll ) 46 Mbps on my Huawei 4G dongle- but ona 3G Mobile Broadband SIM card!
Customer service is pretty useless though!
Internet connection though is Amazing- given that we're in super rural Ireland, living inthe bluestack mountains.
As someone from London, where even other "well known" FIBRE providers only hit 100 Mbps, this is very impressive.
Overal 7/10, based on my user experience over 4-5 years, using the internet for up to 3-6 hours each day, and doing heavy bandwidth engineers/technical work, with computers in other parts of the planet.
Well done Vodafone!
A++
Overall marks 8/10.
And thank you.
